headline: Hubbell to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conference
summary: Shelton, CT, March 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hubbell Incorporated (NYSE: HUBB) today announced that Bill Sperry, Chief Financial Officer, will appear at the J.P. Morgan 2025 Industrials Conference. The event will be webcast and is scheduled to begin at 12:15PM ET on Tuesday, March 11, 2025. The live audio of the event will be available and can be accessed by visiting Hubbell's Investor Relations section. You can also access this information by going to www.hubbell.com and selecting "Investors
